document.full_text: a jury in vienna convicted three chechen exiles in the murder of umar s. israilov, who had criticized the chechen leader ramzan a. kadyrov.
document.title: 3 men convicted of killing opponent of chechnya's leader
lines_and_colors: a jury in vienna convicted three chechen exiles in the murder of umar s. israilov, who had criticized the chechen leader ramzan a. kadyrov.
